My favorite Counter-Strike game so far, this gave me a lot more of a tf2 vibe to it, with a cleaner engine than it's predecessor and a variety of servers to choose from. So take Counter-Strike, and put it on the source code with a clean, realistic art style and fast pacing and without bots. Definitely worth playing and I recommend buying it. Worth the price.
